job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in 'AI model fine-tuning sessions', which is a core task in adapting and improving AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are traditional software development activities, even when applied to AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of different capabilities (human and AI) to deliver a service, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products, a key aspect of learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating a pragmatic approach to overcoming challenges.

profile.rationale: The job primarily focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer support resolutions and improving existing AI systems (Macro-Category A tasks like 'Software Development & Integration'). While there's mention of 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' (Macro-Category B), the core responsibility is the application and improvement of AI within a support context, rather than deep model development or specialization. The role is about using and enhancing AI as part of a broader support system, aligning with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a customer support context. The tasks lean heavily towards applying and refining existing AI systems rather than building them from scratch or specializing in advanced AI research. The profile assignment is well-supported by the text, though the mention of 'fine-tuning' could slightly blur lines if it were a more significant part of the role.
